title: Bucaramanga Air Quality Data for Canonical Correlation Analysis
description: This dataset contains air quality and meteorological data collected in Bucaramanga, Colombia, for Canonical Correlation Analysis (CCA) of atmospheric pollutants (O₃, PM2.5, PM10, SO₂) and meteorological variables (wind speed, air temperature, relative humidity) from multiple monitoring stations (2021–2023). The data supports the analyses in the manuscript 'Canonical Correlation Analysis on Air Pollutants: A Study on Suburban Areas of the Northeast Andean Mountains' (Torres et al., 2025, submitted to Smart Cities).
